description.value: Character can use all weapons of Class Pistol, Basic, Melee, Throwing, and Vehicle within the group they select wihtout the -20 Penalty. Character requires Weapon Training (Heavy) and a weapon type training to wield heavy weapons without penalty. Weapon Types: Bolt, Chain, Flame, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, Power, Low-Tech(Primitive), Shock, and SP Other: Heavy
